size.description: Specifies a max number of results to get (default: 100)

index_name.description: A comma-separated list of connector index names to fetch connector documents for

connector_name.description: A comma-separated list of connector names to fetch connector documents for

service_type.description: A comma-separated list of connector service types to fetch connector documents for

query.description: A search string for querying connectors, filtering results by matching against connector names, descriptions, and index names

include_deleted.description: A flag indicating whether to return connectors that have been soft-deleted.
